Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street, near the primary shipyards of Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: Darby Reynolds builds any size ship for any person with the correct amount of gold. His ships are said to be works of art; most of them are still sailing the many oceans. Darby's Shipyard Office is on the west side of Main Street. Heading North, you can now see the blue- green water of Nylandian Bay. On the east, there is a shop with a large banner which reads "Empirial Flags". The banner is ornately stitched with the finest silks.
